item.title: Flashback: Backdoor Corporate Sabotage With DNS
item.description: This is just an old entry that I thought was interesting, and it appears its still relevant. Like a broken record, “economic times are rough”, what better way to boost your revenue than to exploit your customers. What better way to suppress a competitor than to increase a competitors infrastructure costs (with little visibility to boot). I did some repeated lookups this morning and got similar results. Backdoor Corporate Sabotage With DNS
